verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year שָׁל֔וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> In the third לְמַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the reign בֵּלְאשַׁצַּ֣ר <S%H1112><s%> Belshazzar הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king חָז֞וֹן <S%H2377><s%> a vision נִרְאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> appeared אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> to me דָנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> unto me [even unto] me Daniel אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> after הַנִּרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> that which appeared אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me בַּתְּחִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8462><s%> unto me at the first

וָֽאֶרְאֶה֮ <S%H7200><s%> And I saw בֶּחָזוֹן֒ <S%H2377><s%> in a vision וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בִּרְאֹתִ֔י <S%H7200><s%> and it came to pass when I saw וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> myself בְּשׁוּשַׁ֣ן <S%H7800><s%> that I [was] at Shushan הַבִּירָ֔ה <S%H1002><s%> [in] the palace אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּעֵילָ֣ם <S%H5867><s%> of Elam הַמְּדִינָ֑ה <S%H4082><s%> which [is] in the province וָאֶרְאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> and I saw בֶּֽחָז֔וֹן <S%H2377><s%> in a vision וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> myself הָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was beside אוּבַ֥ל <S%H180><s%> and I was by the river אוּלָֽי׃ <S%H195><s%> of Ulai

וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> Then I lifted up עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes וָאֶרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> and saw וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> and behold אַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> ram אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> a עֹמֵ֛ד <S%H5975><s%> and behold there stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאֻבָ֖ל <S%H180><s%> the river וְל֣וֹ קְרָנָ֑יִם <S%H7161><s%> which had [two] horns וְהַקְּרָנַ֣יִם <S%H7161><s%> and the [two] horns גְּבֹה֗וֹת <S%H1364><s%> [were] high וְהָאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> but one גְּבֹהָ֣ה <S%H1364><s%> [was] higher מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הַשֵּׁנִ֔ית <S%H8145><s%> than the other וְהַ֨גְּבֹהָ֔ה <S%H1364><s%> and the higher עֹלָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> came up בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <S%H314><s%> last

רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֡יִל <S%H352><s%> the ram מְנַגֵּחַ֩ <S%H5055><s%> pushing יָ֨מָּה <S%H3220><s%> westward וְצָפ֜וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> and northward וָנֶ֗גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> and southward וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> no חַיּוֹת֙ <S%H2416><s%> so that no beasts לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no יַֽעַמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> might stand לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> before וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> nor מַצִּ֖יל <S%H5337><s%> him neither [was there any] that could deliver מִיָּד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> out of his hand וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> but he did כִרְצֹנ֖וֹ <S%H7522><s%> according to his will וְהִגְדִּֽיל׃ <S%H1431><s%> and became great

וַאֲנִ֣י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become מֵבִ֗ין <S%H995><s%> And as I was considering וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold צְפִיר־ <S%H6842><s%> goat הָֽעִזִּים֙ <S%H5795><s%> behold an he בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַֽמַּעֲרָב֙ <S%H4628><s%> from the west עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> on the face כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without נוֹגֵ֖עַ <S%H5060><s%> and touched בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> not the ground וְהַ֨צָּפִ֔יר <S%H6842><s%> and the goat קֶ֥רֶן <S%H7161><s%> horn חָז֖וּת <S%H2380><s%> [had] a notable בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between עֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> between his eyes

וַיָּבֹ֗א <S%H935><s%> And he came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> up הָאַ֙יִל֙ <S%H352><s%> to the ram בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> that had הַקְּרָנַ֔יִם <S%H7161><s%> [two] horns אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which רָאִ֔יתִי <S%H7200><s%> which I had seen עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> standing לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאֻבָ֑ל <S%H180><s%> the river וַיָּ֥רָץ <S%H7323><s%> and ran אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about בַּחֲמַ֥ת <S%H2534><s%> unto him in the fury כֹּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3581><s%> of his power

וּרְאִיתִ֞יו <S%H7200><s%> And I saw מַגִּ֣יעַ ׀ <S%H5060><s%> him come אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> close unto הָאַ֗יִל <S%H352><s%> the ram וַיִּתְמַרְמַ֤ר <S%H4843><s%> and he was moved with choler אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> at וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> against him and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> the ram וַיְשַׁבֵּר֙ <S%H7665><s%> and brake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> his two קְרָנָ֔יו <S%H7161><s%> horns וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> had כֹ֛חַ <S%H3581><s%> and there was no power בָּאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> in the ram לַעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> to stand לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> before וַיַּשְׁלִיכֵ֤הוּ <S%H7993><s%> him but he cast him down אַ֙רְצָה֙ <S%H776><s%> to the ground וַֽיִּרְמְסֵ֔הוּ <S%H7429><s%> and stamped וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> none הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had מַצִּ֛יל <S%H5337><s%> upon him and there was none that could deliver לָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> the ram מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> out of his hand

וּצְפִ֥יר <S%H6842><s%> Therefore the he הָעִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> goat הִגְדִּ֣יל <S%H1431><s%> great עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> waxed very וּכְעָצְמ֗וֹ <S%H6105><s%> and when he was strong נִשְׁבְּרָה֙ <S%H7665><s%> was broken הַקֶּ֣רֶן <S%H7161><s%> horn הַגְּדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> the great וַֽתַּעֲלֶ֜נָה <S%H5927><s%> and for it came up חָז֤וּת <S%H2380><s%> notable ones אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> four תַּחְתֶּ֔יהָ <S%H8478><s%> place לְאַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> toward the four רוּח֥וֹת <S%H7307><s%> winds הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Out הָאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> And out of one מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> of them יָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> of them came forth קֶֽרֶן־ <S%H7161><s%> horn אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> of one מִצְּעִירָ֑ה <S%H4704><s%> a little וַתִּגְדַּל־ <S%H1431><s%> great יֶ֛תֶר <S%H3499><s%> which waxed exceeding אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַנֶּ֥גֶב <S%H5045><s%> toward the south וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַמִּזְרָ֖ח <S%H4217><s%> and toward the east וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and toward הַצֶּֽבִי׃ <S%H6643><s%> and toward the pleasant

וַתִּגְדַּ֖ל <S%H1431><s%> And it waxed great עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> up צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> [even] to the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וַתַּפֵּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> and it cast down אַ֛רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the ground מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַצָּבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> [some] of the host וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and some הַכּוֹכָבִ֖ים <S%H3556><s%> and of the stars וַֽתִּרְמְסֵֽם׃ <S%H7429><s%> and stamped

וְעַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> even שַֽׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> [himself] even to the prince הַצָּבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> of the host הִגְדִּ֑יל <S%H1431><s%> Yea he magnified וּמִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> at [הֵרִים כ] (הוּרַ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> bring up ק) הַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> and by him the daily וְהֻשְׁלַ֖ךְ <S%H7993><s%> was cast down מְכ֥וֹן <S%H4349><s%> and the place מִקְדָּשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H4720><s%> of his sanctuary

וְצָבָ֛א <S%H6635><s%> And an host תִּנָּתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> was given עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> along הַתָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> [him] against the daily בְּפָ֑שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> [sacrifice] by reason of transgression וְתַשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <S%H7993><s%> and it cast down אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> the truth אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the ground וְעָשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and it practised וְהִצְלִֽיחָה׃ <S%H6743><s%> and prospered

וָאֶשְׁמְעָ֥ה <S%H8085><s%> Then I heard אֶֽחָד־ <S%H259><s%> one קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> saint מְדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> speaking וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said אֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> and another קָד֜וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> saint לַפַּֽלְמוֹנִ֣י <S%H6422><s%> unto that certain הַֽמְדַבֵּ֗ר <S%H1696><s%> [saint] which spake עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֞י <S%H4970><s%> How הֶחָז֤וֹן <S%H2377><s%> How long [shall be] the vision הַתָּמִיד֙ <S%H8548><s%> [concerning] the daily וְהַפֶּ֣שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> [sacrifice] and the transgression שֹׁמֵ֔ם <S%H8074><s%> of desolation תֵּ֛ת <S%H5414><s%> to give וְקֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> both the sanctuary וְצָבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> and the host מִרְמָֽס׃ <S%H4823><s%> tread -ing

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against עֶ֣רֶב <S%H6153><s%> evenings בֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> mornings אַלְפַּ֖יִם <S%H505><s%> unto me Unto two thousand וּשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three מֵא֑וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְנִצְדַּ֖ק <S%H6663><s%> be cleansed קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> then shall the sanctuary

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become בִּרְאֹתִ֛י <S%H7200><s%> had seen אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I דָנִיֵּ֖אל <S%H1840><s%> And it came to pass when I [even] I Daniel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶחָז֑וֹן <S%H2377><s%> the vision וָאֲבַקְשָׁ֣ה <S%H1245><s%> and sought בִינָ֔ה <S%H998><s%> for the meaning וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold עֹמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> then behold there stood לְנֶגְדִּ֖י <S%H5048><s%> before כְּמַרְאֵה־ <S%H4758><s%> before me as the appearance גָֽבֶר׃ <S%H1397><s%> of a man

וָאֶשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> And I heard קוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> voice אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> a man's בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between אוּלָ֑י <S%H195><s%> between [the banks of] Ulai וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> which called וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said גַּבְרִיאֵ֕ל <S%H1403><s%> Gabriel הָבֵ֥ן <S%H995><s%> [man] to understand לְהַלָּ֖ז <S%H1975><s%> make this אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H4758><s%> the vision

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> So he came אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> near עָמְדִ֔י <S%H5975><s%> abide וּבְבֹא֣וֹ <S%H935><s%> and when he came נִבְעַ֔תִּי <S%H1204><s%> I was afraid וָאֶפְּלָ֖ה <S%H5307><s%> and fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> upon my face וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> but he said אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about הָבֵ֣ן <S%H995><s%> unto me Understand בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> O son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעֶת־ <S%H6256><s%> for at the time קֵ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> of the end הֶחָזֽוֹן׃ <S%H2377><s%> [shall be] the vision

וּבְדַבְּר֣וֹ <S%H1696><s%> Now as he was speaking עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> with נִרְדַּ֥מְתִּי <S%H7290><s%> with me I was in a deep sleep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> on my face אָ֑רְצָה <S%H776><s%> toward the ground וַיִּ֨גַּע־ <S%H5060><s%> but he touched בִּ֔י וַיַּֽעֲמִידֵ֖נִי <S%H5975><s%> me and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עָמְדִֽי׃ <S%H5975><s%> stand

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold מוֹדִֽיעֲךָ֔ <S%H3045><s%> Behold I will make thee know אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> will occur בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <S%H319><s%> what shall be in the last end הַזָּ֑עַם <S%H2195><s%> of the indignation כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for pertains לְמוֹעֵ֥ד <S%H4150><s%> for at the time appointed קֵֽץ׃ <S%H7093><s%> the end
